top_stories.title: Cohere hires long-time Meta research head Joelle Pineau as its chief AI officer
top_stories.description: Cohere has hired Joelle Pineau, Meta's former VP of AI research who previously oversaw the tech giant's fundamental AI research (FAIR) lab. In her newly created Chief AI Officer role, Pineau will oversee AI strategy across Cohere's research, product, and policy teams.
top_stories.author: Maxwell Zeff
top_stories.content: Cohere has hired Joelle Pineau, Meta's former VP of AI research who previously oversaw the tech giant's fundamental AI research (FAIR) lab. In her newly created Chief AI Officer role, Pineau will oversee AI strategy across Cohere's research, product, and policy teams.

top_stories.title: Wanna catch the AI bus? Linux Foundation India’s clarion call for Indian IT community
top_stories.description: The only way to get ahead is to participate and contribute to open source, says Arpit Joshipura, head of the Linux Foundation India. The post Wanna catch the AI bus? Linux Foundation India’s clarion call for Indian IT community appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.
top_stories.author: C P Balasubramanyam
top_stories.content: The only way to get ahead is to participate and contribute to open source, says Arpit Joshipura, head of the Linux Foundation India. The post Wanna catch the AI bus? Linux Foundation India’s clarion call for Indian IT community appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.

top_stories.title: No Backdoors. No Kill Switches. No Spyware.
top_stories.description: NVIDIA GPUs are at the heart of modern computing. They’re used across industries — from healthcare and finance to scientific research, autonomous systems and AI infrastructure. NVIDIA GPUs are embedded into CT scanners and MRI machines, DNA sequencers, air-traffic radar tracking systems, city traffic-management systems, self-driving cars, supercomputers, TV broadcasting systems, casino machines and game Read Article
top_stories.author: David Reber Jr.
top_stories.content: NVIDIA GPUs are at the heart of modern computing. They’re used across industries — from healthcare and finance to scientific research, autonomous systems and AI infrastructure. top_stories.title: Gate-level emulation of an Intel 4004 in 4004 bytes of C
top_stories.description: A feature-complete gate-level microcoded Intel 4004 in 4004 bytes of C, capable of emulating the original Busicom calculator ROM for which the chip was originally designed.
top_stories.content: A feature-complete gate-level microcoded Intel 4004 in 4004 bytes of C, capable of emulating the original Busicom calculator ROM for which the chip was originally designed.

top_stories.title: The End of Limitless Compute: AI’s Physical Reality
top_stories.description: For developers, compute has long been an abstraction—a limitless resource summoned with an API call. That illusion is now shattering against hard physical realities. The voracious appetite of AI means the success of your next application may depend less on the elegance of your algorithm and more on your cloud provider’s ability to navigate aContinue reading "The End of Limitless Compute: AI’s Physical Reality" The post The End of Limitless Compute: AI’s Physical Reality appeared first on...
